reviews_data.review_text: This was my first visit to Indigo and it's an understatement to say that I thoroughly enjoyed the atmosphere, the specialty coffee (I had the Coquito ), and the customer service! We are definitely coming back!!
We tried the bourbon vanilla lattes and they were so good! The staff was so nice and the ambiance was very chill

Coffee 100/10
Owner & Staff so nice & helpful!
Ample Space to work or just converse with friends
My new go-to Coffee spot in Charlotte
Great Barista, great Americano. I'll be back!

Indigo is amazing!!! From the atmosphere,  music, customer service and especially the drinks!! My go to Tea and Coffee spot now!!

My favorite  right now is Carmel Cookie but the Strawberry Shortcake is good too! Get them both

Free~

I love trying coffee shops and sitting in them all day to do work. @indigoclt did not disappoint with the vibes, eclectic seating and shoutouts to the music, games and television for entertainment!
The best part about this new shop is that it is black owned in a highly sought area of #charlottenc
Order:
* -Iced Almond Milk Matcha
- Iced Banana Bread Oatmilk Latte w/ cinnamon

Love this coffee shop! The owner & staff are very friendly & gave great recommendations. I got the coquito iced latte with oat milk & lovedddd it! I believe it's seasonal but I truly enjoyed every sip of it. The atmosphere is very nice too, very cozy. They have lounging chairs or hightop tables, candles on some of the tables, and music playing in the background. Definitely nice to do some work, or meet up with friends.

Such a cute spot with amazing coffee! We ordered the caramel cookie latte and the banana bread latte. Both with oat milk! The flavor was perfect! The owner, Reba made our order with a smile and provided great recs while ordering. We love a small coffee shop vibe. There was plenty of room to work as well. No doubt we will be back.

My food review is based off of coffee -- I didn't have a pastry during this trip.

I did, however, have the best decaf Cardamom Fig latte (which Reba -- the owner-- ground for me fresh). The quality of my drink was exceptional and the service was impeccable.

Indigo Coffee & Tea is located inside Alongside Brewing and the vibes are soothing. From the playlist and artwork to the furniture in the space and the lighting, this little coffee spot hidden near the heart of  Charlotte is a nice place to meet with friends, work solo, or just hide away.

Parking is limited to keep that in mind, however, it's worth the stop!
